name: plankton
description: $plankton is a memecoin in Solana, which seeks to represent the fan base of the super viral tiktok meme which bears the same name: plankton. $plankton in Solana promotes the use of the meme on social networks, being a meeting point for the community of said meme. The purpose of $plankton is to give community members the opportunity to buy a token with which they feel represented. $plankton works only as a fan base of the meme, it does not claim the copyright of the meme or anything like that, it only works as a token for the meme community.
